_sText:
April 7, 2011 - V2 Released, changelog below This is my first map, a climb built over the citadel map from HL2, because I decided that I wanted a map with more of a context than just floating platforms.
I learned a lot from building over an existing map (especially one by Valve) enabling me to make major extensions to it whilst preserving the visual and structural style of the combine citadel.

This map includes soundscapes, custom sounds and custom textures, so make sure to keep the bsp named as it should be.

v2 changes
- Fixed being able to get on top of the little concrete surf
- Fixed elevators height glitching after players block them
- Adjusted some steps underneath the huge tilted piece of glass near 2 elevators
- Adjusted the positioning of combine terminals, making them easier to climb
- Adjusted ceiling of an area that players have to crawl through, in case they saved
- Placed playerclip underneath elevators to stop players getting crushed
- Added more arrows
- Added a ladder in case players dropped down to a wrong area and saved
- Removed an unintended step which players could get to
- Added "xc_citadel_01 by Acren" hint
